content: A mixture of Cd(OAc)2·2H2O (26.8 mg, 0.10 mmol), NaSCN (8.1 mg, 0.10 mmol), bix (23.8 mg, 0.10 mmol), H2O (6 mL), and 0.2 M NaOH (1.0 mL) solution was stirred in air for 0.5-h. The solution was transferred to a 25 mL stainless steel reactor with a Teflon liner and heated at 120 °C for 120-h. The reaction was cooled to room temperature and pale yellow block crystals were obtained; yield, 58.4 % based on Cd. Anal. Calcd. (%) for C60H56N20S4Cd2: C, 51.10; H, 4.00; N, 19.86; Found: C, 51.03; H, 4.11; N, 20.38. IR (KBr pellet, cm−1): 3136 (w), 2060 (w), 1711 (s), 1605 (s), 1585 (s), 1515 (s), 1389 (s), 1276 (s), 1223 (s), 1117 (m), 934 (s), 825 (m), 777 (m), 715 (s), 698 (s).
clean_text:
Preparation of [Cd4(bix)8(SCN)8] (1)

A mixture of Cd(OAc)2⋅2H2O (26.8 mg, 0.10 mmol), NaSCN (8.1 mg, 0.10 mmol), bix (23.8 mg, 0.10 mmol), H2O (6 mL), and 0.2 M NaOH (1.0 mL) solution was stirred in air for 0.5-h. The solution was transferred to a 25 mL stainless steel reactor with a Teflon liner and heated at 120 °C for 120-h. The reaction was cooled to room temperature and pale yellow block crystals were obtained; yield, 58.4 % based on Cd. Anal. Calcd. (%) for C60H56N20S4Cd2: C, 51.10; H, 4.00; N, 19.86; Found: C, 51.03; H, 4.11; N, 20.38. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3136 (w), 2060 (w), 1711 (s), 1605 (s), 1585 (s), 1515 (s), 1389 (s), 1276 (s), 1223 (s), 1117 (m), 934 (s), 825 (m), 777 (m), 715 (s), 698 (s).
